title: Need a tech/display/bold typeface for a logo design
content:
Hello,

I would like some suggestions for a bold/strong/techy/urban/display typeface. Preferably no serifs and not too rounded. I would prefer free fonts or free for personal use because I'm doing this work for a school project.

Thank you !
author: Ju22

comments.content: Have you checked [Google Web Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418204438/http:/www.google.com/webfonts) collection. You may find something usable there.
